## Connect.connect() method

Connects to a server at the specified host.

**Signature:**

```typescript
connect(host?: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

host


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The host to connect to. Defaults to GENESIS\_SOCKET\_URL.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves with a boolean indicating whether the connection was successful.
